item.title: How to Propagate ZZ Plant
item.dc:creator: Neil Mahaseth
item.description:
Hi friends in this video I will show you how you can propagate the ZZ plant. I will show you using three methods division, stem cutting, leaving cutting. ▼Scan @...

The post How to Propagate ZZ Plant appeared first on Plants My Love.
item.content:encoded:
Hi friends in this video I will show you how you can propagate the ZZ plant. I will show you using three methods division, stem cutting, leaving cutting.

▼Scan @ Video Index▼

  • 00:00 Intro
  • 1:25 Propagate by Division
  • 2:06 Remove Plant from Pot
  • 2:58 Expose the Roots & Tuber
  • 4:05 Divide the plant
  • 6:01 Create Potting Mix
  • 7:02 Propagate from Stem Cutting
  • 8:45 Propagate from Leaf Cutting
  • 8:52 Pluck Leaf from Stem
  • 9:41 Partially Bury Leaf
  • 10:22 Water the Cuttings
  • 11:17 Add Humidity Dome
  • 12:04 Keep in indirect light

ZZ Mother Plant


Remove Plant from Pot


Expose the Roots & Tuber


Divide the plant


Create Potting Mix

Repot Divided Plant

Cut Stem For Propagation

Pot Cutting in Perlite


Pluck Leaf from Stem


Partially Bury Leaf


Water the Cuttings


Add Humidity Dome


Keep in indirect light

I hope friends, you liked this guide on how to propagate ZZ Plant using division, stem cutting, and leaf-cutting. If yes, don’t forget to share this video with your friends and family whom you think could benefit from it. If you liked this, you might also like our other gardening-related content. Make sure to subscribe to our YouTube channel or join our mailing list to be alerted as soon as a new video is released. Thanks for watching friends see you later bye.

The post How to Propagate ZZ Plant appeared first on Plants My Love.

item.content:encoded:
Hi friends in this video I will show you how I grew Railway Creeper (Morning Glory Species) from layering. This video contains growth updates for 1 year. This is a step-by-step tutorial using which you can propagate any plant from the layering method.

item.content:encoded:
Hello, friends in this video we will look at the beautiful cockscomb plant. We will first discuss the cockscomb plant details like type of flowers, color, native place, ideal climate, etc. Then I will show you how I grew the Cockscomb plant from seeds I will share with you more than 2 months’ worth of plant growth updates.

item.content:encoded:
